item.description:
Blue Plate Radio and Blue Plate Radio Productions presents LaBoca Jazz with The Doug Jones Group

 Every Thursday night in August and September, Blue Plate Radio and Blue Plate Radio Productions presents LaBoca Jazz - LIVE, FREE Contemporary and Latin Jazz at LaBoca Mexican Restaurant (http://www.labocaonmain.com) from 8-11pm. It's Hotter Than a Jalapeno and the Food's Great too!

The Doug Jones Group has been performing their original brand of smooth jazz throughout New England for 15 years. From Newport to Manhattan, Boston and South America, the group has delighted its audiences for years.

http://www.dougjonesgroup.com/

There is no cover charge but I need to reserve a table, I am asking only those serious about coming to sign up, since they are kindly going to reserve a table for us, (no -NO SHOWS). $5.00 sign up with PAYPAL is required. Take the $5.00 off your food/drink bill that night "No shows will not get refunded".
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Art & Creative Cultural events table
item.name: Blue Plate Radio and Blue Plate Radio Productions presents LaBoca Jazz
